p.d: The body of a professional climber is found at the foot of a cliff: her equipment sabotaged. Why kill an apparently ordinary woman, recently returned to the region after an absence of several years? What connection with the accidental death of her former assistant on the same rock face? Directed by: Delphine Lemoine (season 3, France, 2018) Screenplay: Philippe Lyon Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Nelly Lawson (Camille), François Dominique Blin (Franck Marvaud), Sarah-Cheyenne (Alice), Guillemette Barioz (Sophie Vannier), Titouan Laporte (Thomas), Romain Debouchaud (Julien Garrido), Pascal Gimenez (Grégory), Roméo Mariani (Lucas Menoul), LoIc Riewer (Dan Tulak), Manie Malone (Malika) Genre: detective
